sentence.Network_en: Calder smiled charmingly and put out his hand. "A pleasure, Mrs Talbot."
sentence.Network_cn: 考尔德满面春风，伸出手来说：“幸会幸会，塔尔博特夫人。”

sentence.Network_en: A boy and a girl are chatting charmingly together.
sentence.Network_cn: 一个男孩和一个女孩正在娓娓交谈.

sentence.Network_en: Carrie had gotten herself up charmingly enough, but this woman pained her by contrast.
sentence.Network_cn: 嘉莉把自己打扮得也够迷人的.但相形之下,这个女人让嘉莉感到痛心.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 接近charry的字词 ...charmingly 迷人地;快乐地Charmouthian 查茅斯阶; 察尔毛茨阶

list.abs: 描述女人美丽、可爱、一切美好的单词、短语有哪... ... beautiful  fairness  goodliness 美丽的 charmingly feminine 妩媚动人的.
什么意思_英语charmingly在线翻译... ... charmingly feminine 妩媚动人的 charmingly naive 憨态可掬 A charmingly 一种迷人.
A boy and a girl are chatting charmingly together ., 一个男孩和一个女孩正在娓娓交谈.
摇曳的英文翻译，摇曳用英语怎么说... ... 垂柳摇曳 swaying weeping willow 摇曳多姿 sway charmingly 轻轻摇曳 lightly flutter.

entry.def: If you say that something is charming, you mean that it is very pleasant or attractive.

example.ex: ...the charming custom of wearing a rose on that day.
example.tran: 在那天戴朵玫瑰的可爱风俗

entry.tran: 和蔼可亲的;富有魅力的;讨人喜爱的
entry.def: If you describe someone as charming, you mean they behave in a friendly, pleasant way that makes people like them.

example.ex: He found her as smart and beautiful as she is charming...
example.tran: 他感觉她聪明漂亮，又讨人喜欢。

entry.tran: (对于别人的粗鲁行为或听到他人劣迹时表示不赞同)岂有此理！
entry.def: You can say 'Charming!' to indicate your disapproval when someone has just been rude to you or told you about someone's bad behaviour.

example.ex: 'I'm glad I'm not going with you, that's for sure.' — 'Oh, charming!'...
example.tran: “我非常高兴不和你同去，真的。”——“好哇，有种！”

example.ex: 'They wanted to stop my dole money for those days.' — 'Charming!'
example.tran: “他们想停掉我那些日子的救济金。”——“岂有此理！”
